Name: Up & Away
About the game: Designed from the ground up to be a very accessible casual puzzle game, only one button is required to traverse through forty levels of increasing difficulty across four different environments. Engage the player ship's engine to control vertical ascension and use moving platforms to gain horizontal momentum in order to clear obstacles. Note: Mouse is required to navigate the game's menus.
Meta Title: Up & Away: Nov 16, 2022, Andrei Radu and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Up & Away? Check out the release date (Nov 16, 2022), developer insights from Andrei Radu, and a complete game summary.
